body:
I give a 7/10

overall, it's good.

I just don't like how our levels and stuff are gone & how it's 1.8.

What do you guys think? :)

title: Rate The Update

replies.body:
I would like to come back and view the update.. Looks very nice! 

Just by looking at the update, and what has occurred, I'll give it a good 8.5/10! Lots of improvement done! Great job to everyone who contributed to making the update become successful, and look so amazing!

Miss y'all, 

Senor

replies.body: I'm gonna say 11/10 xD This update is absolutely fantastic!! Thank you so much kylo and Spencer for everything and shout out to the map devs for all the maps as well! :]

replies.body: Although the transition to 1.8 is rather disappointing, I'd give the update a 10/10. It cleans up a lot of messes, makes everything look pretty, and re-adds features while keeping the solid look of the forums c:
